workflow.name: Trustpilot review sentiment analysis with OpenAI & Bright Data to Google Sheets
workflow.description:
This workflow automatically scrapes customer reviews from Trustpilot and performs sentiment analysis to extract valuable customer insights. It saves you time by eliminating the need to manually read through reviews and provides structured data on customer feedback, sentiment, and pain points.

## Overview

This workflow automatically scrapes the latest customer reviews from any Trustpilot company page and uses AI to analyze each review for sentiment, extract key complaints or praise, and identify recurring customer pain points. It stores all structured review data in Google Sheets for easy analysis and reporting.

## Tools Used

- **n8n**: The automation platform that orchestrates the workflow
- **Bright Data**: For scraping Trustpilot review pages without being blocked
- **OpenAI**: AI agent for intelligent review analysis and sentiment extraction
- **Google Sheets**: For storing structured review data and analysis results

## How to Install

1. **Import the Workflow**: Download the .json file and import it into your n8n instance
2. **Configure Bright Data**: Add your Bright Data credentials to the MCP Client node
3. **Set Up OpenAI**: Configure your OpenAI API credentials
4. **Configure Google Sheets**: Connect your Google Sheets account and set up your review tracking spreadsheet
5. **Customize**: Enter target Trustpilot company URLs and adjust review analysis parameters

## Use Cases

- **Product Teams**: Identify customer pain points and feature requests from reviews
- **Customer Support**: Monitor customer satisfaction and recurring issues
- **Marketing Teams**: Extract positive testimonials and understand customer sentiment
- **Business Intelligence**: Track brand reputation and customer feedback trends

## Connect with Me

- **Website**: https://www.nofluff.online
- **YouTube**: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
- **LinkedIn**: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
- **Get Bright Data**: https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25 (Using this link supports my free workflows with a small commission)

#n8n #automation #trustpilot #reviewscraping #sentimentanalysis #brightdata #webscraping #customerreviews #n8nworkflow #workflow #nocode #reviewautomation #customerinsights #brandmonitoring #reviewanalysis #customerfeedback #reputationmanagement #reviewmonitoring #customersentiment #productfeedback #trustpilotscraping #reviewdata #customerexperience #businessintelligence #feedbackanalysis #reviewtracking #customervoice #aianalysis #reviewmining #customerinsights

parameters.text:
=`You are a web scraper connected to Bright Data's MCP tool using the scrape_as_markdown function.

Scrape the latest 5 reviews from the Trustpilot company page at this URL:
{{ $json.URL }}

Use the scrape_as_markdown tool with these parameters:
{
  "url": {{ $json.URL }},
  "max_items": 5
}

After scraping, analyze each review and return a JSON array of 5 objects with these fields:

- reviewer (string)
- date (string)
- rating (number)
- sentiment (one of "positive", "neutral", or "negative")
- mainIssue (string ‚Äî summarize complaint or praise)
- reviewText (string)

Return only valid JSON.
`

parameters.content:
üîπ SECTION 1: üö¶ Start & Input Company URL
üß© Includes Nodes:

üîò Trigger: Manual Start

üè¢ Set Company Profile URL

üë£ What It Does:
This is your starting point. You manually click "Execute workflow" in n8n to begin the automation. The second node takes the company‚Äôs Trustpilot URL as input ‚Äî this tells the AI agent which business page to scrape reviews from.

ü§ñ SECTION 2: üß† AI Agent ‚Äì Scrape, Analyze & Summarize Trustpilot Reviews
üß© Includes Nodes:

ü§ñ Agent: Fetch & Analyze Reviews

üß† Chat Model (AI Reasoning)

üåê Bright Data MCP Client

üßæ JSON Review Formatter

Here‚Äôs what happens step-by-step:

üß† The AI reads the Trustpilot company URL that you set earlier.

üåê The Bright Data MCP tool visits the company‚Äôs Trustpilot page using real mobile proxies to safely and accurately scrape the 5 most recent customer reviews.

üß† The AI then performs multiple tasks:

üìñ Reads each review and extracts the reviewer‚Äôs name, rating, and date.

‚ù§Ô∏è Performs sentiment analysis (Is the review positive, negative, or neutral?).

üîÅ Identifies recurring topics across reviews (e.g. ‚Äúlate delivery‚Äù, ‚Äúamazing support‚Äù).

üßµ Summarizes the main customer concern or praise in 1-2 lines.

üìä SECTION 3: üì¶ Split Reviews & üì• Save to Google Sheets
üß© Includes Nodes:

üîç Function: Split Reviews into Objects

üì• Google Sheets: Append Reviews

Here‚Äôs how it works:
üîç The Function node (Split Reviews into Objects) receives the JSON array of all 5 reviews from the AI agent.
üëâ It loops through the array and separates each review into its own distinct object.

This ensures:

Each review has its own data record

Clean and structured data per review

Compatibility with downstream systems like spreadsheets, CRMs, or dashboards

üì• The Google Sheets node receives these separate review objects and writes them to your Google Sheet, one row per review.

Analyze Review Site Sentiment

‚ú® Built in n8n | AI-Powered | No-Code Automation

üöÄ Workflow Overview
This workflow automates the process of retrieving, analyzing, summarizing, and saving customer reviews from any Trustpilot company page. It enables you to extract key insights from real users without manual effort or coding.

üõ†Ô∏è Tools Used:

n8n (No-code automation builder)

Bright Data MCP (Mobile proxy scraper)

OpenAI (for AI-powered reasoning and sentiment analysis)

Google Sheets (for storing the results)

üß© Workflow Sections
üîπ SECTION 1: üü¢ Start & Input Company URL
üß© Nodes:

üîò Manual Start

üè¢ Set Trustpilot Company URL

üéØ Description:
This section allows the user to trigger the workflow manually and provide a specific Trustpilot company profile URL as input.

üìå Key Benefits:

Simple to use ‚Äî just paste the company URL

Reusable for any business

No backend modifications required to target a new company

ü§ñ SECTION 2: üß† AI Agent ‚Äî Scrape, Analyze & Summarize
üß© Nodes:

ü§ñ Agent: Fetch and Analyze Reviews

üß† Chat Model (AI Reasoning)

üåê Bright Data MCP Scraper (executeTool)

üßæ JSON Review Formatter (Output Parser)

üéØ Description:
This is the intelligence core of the workflow. It uses the AI agent and Bright Data proxy tool to:

Access the Trustpilot page and scrape the 5 most recent customer reviews

Analyze each review for sentiment (positive, neutral, or negative)

Identify recurring topics or issues mentioned in reviews

Generate a brief summary representing the general customer sentiment

üìå Key Benefits:

No scraping scripts required

Intelligent insight extraction

Works reliably using real mobile IPs (bypasses protection)

üìä SECTION 3: üîç Split Reviews & üì• Save to Google Sheets
üß© Nodes:

üîç Splits Reviews into Separate Objects

üìÑ Save Reviews to Google Sheets

üéØ Description:
This section structures and stores the data. After the AI returns reviews in array format, the function node splits them into separate objects. Each review is then stored as an individual row in Google Sheets.

üìå Key Benefits:

Clean, row-by-row storage for easy review

Compatible with reporting and dashboard tools

Maintains historical record of customer feedback
